mapper.select: SELECT username, password, email, role, picture, enable, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time FROM zthm_user
SELECT username, password, email, role, picture, enable, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time FROM zthm_user WHERE username = #{username}
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO zthm_user USING DUAL ON ( username = #{username, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN /* ON 조건에 해당되는 것이 있으면 아래 실행(UPDATE) */ UPDATE SET password = #{username, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,email = #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,role = #{role, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,picture = #{picture, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN /* ON 조건에 매칭되지 않으면 아래 실행(Insert)*/ INSERT (username, password, email, role, picture, enable, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time) VALUES (#{username, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{role, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picture, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isEnable}, #{createId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmddhh24miss'), #{updateId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmddhh24miss'))
